title: G1 Looking for team to play comps with
body:
Hi,

I am currently Gold 1, (confident ill be plat by end of preseason), and am looking for a team that is fairly serious and wants to play ranked 5's. I have been playing this game for quite a while now and am keen to get into some competitions. Looking for a group of awesome people to have fun with and win games. I play mainly solo lanes and have experience playing in different types of team compositions, strategies, etc. 
Give us an add if interested :)
IGN: ThatsWotSheZed
